definition: in or to or toward a past time, directed or facing toward the back or rear
details:
adverb
- in or to or toward a past time
= synonyms: back
- at or to or toward the back or rear
= synonyms: back
- in a manner or order or direction the reverse of normal
= example: in a manner or order or direction the reverse of normal
= synonyms: backwards
adjective
- directed or facing toward the back or rear
= example: directed or facing toward the back or rear
- (used of temperament or behavior) marked by a retiring nature
= example: (used of temperament or behavior) marked by a retiring nature
- having made less than normal progress
= example: having made less than normal progress
- retarded in intellectual development
= synonyms: half-witted, slow-witted, feebleminded
